tool_description: Monitors and analyzes performance metrics for volunteer opportunity listings including views, applications, and engagement rates.

listing_id.description: ID of the volunteer listing to monitor

include_demographics.description: Whether to include demographic data of applicants

benchmark_comparison.description: Whether to include industry benchmark comparisons

error_messages: Invalid listing ID: The provided listing_id does not exist or has no published listings.
Invalid metrics period: Use 'daily', 'weekly', 'monthly', or 'all-time' for metrics_period.
Insufficient data: Not enough data available for the requested metrics period.
Platform data unavailable: One or more platforms are not providing metrics data.
Analytics access denied: Insufficient permissions to access detailed analytics data.
usage: Provide listing_id to monitor performance metrics. Adjust metrics_period and enable additional analysis options based on reporting needs.

total_applications.description: Total number of volunteer applications received

conversion_rate.description: Percentage of views that resulted in applications

platform_breakdown.description: Performance metrics broken down by platform

trend_analysis.description: Analysis of performance trends over time

benchmark_comparison.description: Comparison against industry benchmarks if enabled
